value.name: March, Candlelight Vigil Planned For One Year Anniversary Of George Floyd’s Death
value.description: Pierro organized signs Monday that will be used in the March for George and Justice rally in Mattapan. It’s one of many happening across the country on Tuesday, which marks the first anniversary of Floyd’s death.
